products.title: Keychron K2 Pro
products.description: A compact wireless mechanical keyboard with QMK/VIA support, hot-swappable switches, and a sleek aluminum frame.

products.title: Logitech MX Keys
products.description: A premium full-size wireless keyboard with backlit keys, perfect for productivity and multi-device use.

products.title: Ducky One 3
products.description: A high-end mechanical keyboard with PBT keycaps, RGB lighting and a solid build quality loved by enthusiasts.

products.title: Logitech G Pro X Superlight 2
products.description: An ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse weighing under 60g with HERO 25K sensor for precise tracking.

products.title: Razer DeathAdder V3
products.description: An ergonomic wired gaming mouse with Focus Pro 30K optical sensor and lightweight design at 59g.

products.title: Zowie EC2-C
products.description: A professional esports mouse with plug and play simplicity, no software needed, perfect for competitive gaming.

products.title: SteelSeries QcK Large
products.description: A large cloth mousepad with micro-woven surface for precise tracking and a non-slip rubber base.

products.title: Logitech G840 XL
products.description: An extra large gaming mousepad measuring 900x400mm, perfect for low sensitivity gamers with a desk-covering design.

products.title: Artisan Zero Soft XL
products.description: A premium Japanese mousepad with exceptional surface consistency and durability, loved by competitive players worldwide.
